summary: Vendor B radio units arriving 3 weeks late
mitigation: Escalate to vendor exec sponsor; pull ahead buffer stock via contingency PO.
Expand automated tests and add shadow environment smoke runs.
Stage rollback plan and pre-approve overtime with NOC.

summary: Change advisory board rejects migration plan
mitigation: Pre-brief CAB reviewers and align on risk mitigations one sprint earlier.
Increase shared lab hours; schedule overnight lab access with vendors.
